415 Capital

415 Capital is a specialist venture capital firm dedicated to investing in breakthrough and life-saving medical innovation. For over 30 years, the team has empowered exceptional entrepreneurs through capital, expertise, and market access, focusing on large unmet patient needs in chronic diseases, particularly cardio & neurovascular disorders.

Offices: Munich (Germany)
